mapper.select: SELECT a.group_id, a.hos_id, a.copy_code, a.in_id, a.detail_id, a.inv_id, a.inv_no, b.inv_code, b.inv_name, b.inv_model, b.unit_code, c.unit_name, a.amount, a.price, a.amount_money, a.pack_code, hp.pack_name, a.num_exchange, a.pack_price, a.num, a.batch_no, a.batch_sn, a.sn, a.bar_code, a.sell_price, a.sell_money, a.inva_date, a.disinfect_date, a.location_id, d.location_name, a.fac_date, a.serial_no, a.note FROM mat_affi_in_detail a left join mat_inv_dict b on a.group_id = b.group_id and a.hos_id = b.hos_id and a.copy_code = b.copy_code and a.inv_id = b.inv_id and a.inv_no = b.inv_no left join hos_unit c on b.group_id = c.group_id and b.hos_id = c.hos_id and b.unit_code = c.unit_code left join mat_location_dict d on a.group_id = d.group_id and a.hos_id = d.hos_id and a.copy_code = d.copy_code and a.location_id = d.location_id left join hos_package hp on a.group_id = hp.group_id and a.hos_id = hp.hos_id and a.pack_code = hp.pack_code and hp.is_stop = 0 WHERE a.group_id = #{group_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and a.hos_id = #{hos_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and a.copy_code = #{copy_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and a.in_id = #{in_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select a.IN_NO,b.BUS_TYPE_NAME,su.sup_code,su.SUP_NAME,s.STORE_CODE,s.STORE_NAME,u1.user_name MAKER, to_char(a.IN_DATE, 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') in_date, to_char(a.CHECK_DATE, 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') check_date, u2.user_name CHECKER,u4.user_name CONFIRMER, to_char(a.CONFIRM_DATE, 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') confirm_date, a.BRIEF,u3.user_name STOCKER,d1.dept_code APP_DEPT_CODE,d1.dept_name APP_DEPT_NAME, t.STOCK_TYPE_NAME,--采购类型 p.PROJ_CODE,p.PROJ_NAME,--项目编码 a.PROTOCOL_CODE,pt.PROTOCOL_NAME,--协议编号 ( select SUM(detail.AMOUNT_MONEY) from mat_affi_in_detail detail where detail.in_id=a.in_id and detail.group_id=a.group_id and detail.hos_id=a.hos_id and detail.copy_code=a.copy_code ) money_sum--合计金额 from mat_affi_in a left join hos_proj_dict p on a.group_id=p.group_id and a.hos_id=p.hos_id and a.proj_id=p.proj_id and p.is_stop=0 left join mat_stock_type t on a.group_id=t.group_id and a.hos_id=t.hos_id and a.copy_code=t.copy_code and a.stock_type_code=t.stock_type_code left join mat_bus_type b on a.BUS_TYPE_CODE=b.bus_type_code left join hos_store_dict s on a.group_id=s.group_id and a.hos_id=s.hos_id and a.store_id=s.store_id and a.store_no=s.store_no left join hos_sup_dict su on a.group_id=su.group_id and a.hos_id=su.hos_id and a.sup_id=su.sup_id and a.sup_no=su.sup_no left join sys_user u1 on a.group_id=u1.group_id and a.hos_id=u1.hos_id and a.MAKER=u1.user_id left join sys_user u2 on a.group_id=u2.group_id and a.hos_id=u2.hos_id and a.CHECKER=u2.user_id left join sys_user u3 on a.group_id=u3.group_id and a.hos_id=u3.hos_id and a.STOCKER=u3.user_id left join sys_user u4 on a.group_id=u4.group_id and a.hos_id=u4.hos_id and a.CONFIRMER=u4.user_id left join hos_dept_dict d1 on a.group_id=d1.group_id and a.hos_id=d1.hos_id and a.app_dept=d1.dept_id and d1.is_stop=0 left join MAT_PROTOCOL_MAIN pt on a.group_id=pt.group_id and a.hos_id=pt.hos_id and a.copy_code=pt.copy_code and a.protocol_code=pt.protocol_code where a.group_id = #{group_id,jdbcType=NUMERIC} and a.hos_id = #{hos_id,jdbcType=NUMERIC} and a.copy_code = #{copy_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and a.in_id=#{in_id,jdbcType=NUMERIC}

select a.in_id as id,a.IN_NO,b.BUS_TYPE_NAME,su.sup_code,su.SUP_NAME,s.STORE_CODE,s.STORE_NAME,u1.user_name MAKER, to_char(a.IN_DATE, 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') in_date, to_char(a.CHECK_DATE, 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') check_date, u2.user_name CHECKER,u4.user_name CONFIRMER, to_char(a.CONFIRM_DATE, 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') confirm_date, a.BRIEF,u3.user_name STOCKER,d1.dept_code APP_DEPT_CODE,d1.dept_name APP_DEPT_NAME, t.STOCK_TYPE_NAME,--采购类型 p.PROJ_CODE,p.PROJ_NAME,--项目编码 a.PROTOCOL_CODE,pt.PROTOCOL_NAME,--协议编号 detail.money_sum,--合计金额 detail.money_sum as MONEY_SUM_UPPER --合计金额大写 from mat_affi_in a left join ( select detail.in_id ,SUM(detail.AMOUNT_MONEY) money_sum from mat_affi_in_detail detail group by detail.in_id ) detail on a.in_id =detail.in_id left join hos_proj_dict p on a.group_id=p.group_id and a.hos_id=p.hos_id and a.proj_id=p.proj_id and p.is_stop=0 left join mat_stock_type t on a.group_id=t.group_id and a.hos_id=t.hos_id and a.copy_code=t.copy_code and a.stock_type_code=t.stock_type_code left join mat_bus_type b on a.BUS_TYPE_CODE=b.bus_type_code left join hos_store_dict s on a.group_id=s.group_id and a.hos_id=s.hos_id and a.store_id=s.store_id and a.store_no=s.store_no left join hos_sup_dict su on a.group_id=su.group_id and a.hos_id=su.hos_id and a.sup_id=su.sup_id and a.sup_no=su.sup_no left join sys_user u1 on a.group_id=u1.group_id and a.hos_id=u1.hos_id and a.MAKER=u1.user_id left join sys_user u2 on a.group_id=u2.group_id and a.hos_id=u2.hos_id and a.CHECKER=u2.user_id left join sys_user u3 on a.group_id=u3.group_id and a.hos_id=u3.hos_id and a.STOCKER=u3.user_id left join sys_user u4 on a.group_id=u4.group_id and a.hos_id=u4.hos_id and a.CONFIRMER=u4.user_id left join hos_dept_dict d1 on a.group_id=d1.group_id and a.hos_id=d1.hos_id and a.app_dept=d1.dept_id and d1.is_stop=0 left join MAT_PROTOCOL_MAIN pt on a.group_id=pt.group_id and a.hos_id=pt.hos_id and a.copy_code=pt.copy_code and a.protocol_code=pt.protocol_code where a.group_id = #{group_id,jdbcType=NUMERIC} and a.hos_id = #{hos_id,jdbcType=NUMERIC} and a.copy_code = #{copy_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and a.in_id in (${paraId})
